name: Saki goes to Equestria
description:
One day Saki woke up and realized she was not in Gensokyo. She panicked. She arrived in the land of horse people known as ponies. 

For the minigames, try clicking or dragging. 

Attribution:

15.ai for the voice lines

15API for a 15.ai Python api

Voicemaker for tying it all together for Renpy

Saki Kurokoma from Touhou Project

Ponies from My Little Pony: Friendship is Magic
